outputs.output_descr: Capacity of selected Local Governments and oversight entities built and delivering accountable, inclusive and demand driven social and economic services. Project duration is November 2012-October 2013. Institutions capacitated to develop, implement and monitor pro-poor and MDG responsive policies/strategies. Specifically, the purpose of this PID is to support the National Planning Authority (NPA) undertake a midterm review of Uganda's National Development Plan (NDP), 2010/11-2014/15. The Mid-Term Review is intended to inform Government on the status of implementation, the results achieved and the challenges in the implementation of the NDP. In addition the Mid-Term Review will also guide the National Planning Authority and the Government on near-term priorities, financial allocations and allow for the attainment of the Governments Vision 2040. Further the PIP will also facilitate the development of a project to support the National Planning Authority design, based on the findings of the Mid-Term Review, the next National Development Plan 2015-2020.
